oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Simple wavefunctions for (2p)(2) P-3 and (2p)(3p) P-1 states of He and isoelectronic ions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PATIL, SH
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: wave-functions
2-electron atoms
helium
systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Some local properties are analysed for (2p)(2) P-3 and (2p)(3p) P-1 states of He and its isoelectronic ions in the domains where one of the electrons is far away, where it is near the nucleus, and where the two electrons are close to each other. Based on these properties, simple wavefunctions with zero free parameters or one free parameter are developed for these states. Apart from giving accurate values for the energies and other properties, these wavefunctions provide a clear insight into the structure of these states.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF PHYSICS B-ATOMIC MOLECULAR AND OPTICAL PHYSICS, 35(9), 2125-2132
